content: readme.md kompose (kubernetes + compose) #kompose channelkompose is tool help users are familiar docker-compose move kubernetes. kompose takes docker compose file translates into kubernetes resources.kompose is convenience tool go local docker development managing application kubernetes. transformation the docker compose format kubernetes resources manifest may be exact, it helps tremendously first deploying application kubernetes. caseconvert docker-compose.yaml kubernetes deployments services one simple command:kompose convert -f docker-compose.yamlinfo kubernetes file "frontend-service.yaml" created info kubernetes file "redis-master-service.yaml" created info kubernetes file "redis-slave-service.yaml" created info kubernetes file "frontend-deployment.yaml" created info kubernetes file "redis-master-deployment.yaml" created info kubernetes file "redis-slave-deployment.yaml" created examples are provided the examples directory.installation have multiple ways install kompose. prefered method is downloading binary the latest github release. entire list installation methods are located our setup.md document.installation methods:binary (prefered method)centosfedoramacos (homebrew)binary installationkompose is released via github a three-week cycle, can all current releases the github release page.# linuxcurl -l https://github.com/kubernetes-incubator/kompose/releases/download/v0.7.0/kompose-linux-amd64 -o kompose# macoscurl -l https://github.com/kubernetes-incubator/kompose/releases/download/v0.7.0/kompose-darwin-amd64 -o kompose# windowscurl -l less-bandwidth intense tarball.shell autocompletion support both bash zsh autocompletion.bash:source <(kompose completion bash)zsh:source <(kompose completion zsh)buildingbuilding go need you need
